attributes.action: Scrappage scheme, allow to buy a car upto 3/5 years old and not just a brand new car
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrappage scheme is a good idea, but not many people with cars over 10 years old can go and afford to buy a brand new car, therefore the people should be allowed to buy a cars thats upto 3/5 years old and still get the 2k.

the details are still being finalised and the scheme will be launching on the 18th of May so please get as much people to sign the petition by then.
